select ai.id, ai.conference_id, ai.owner_id, ai.status, ai.create_date, ai.audit_date, ci.title, ci.address, ci.start_time, ci.end_time, oi.name, oi.images from audit_info ai left join conference_info ci on (ci.id = ai.conference_id) left join owner_info oi on (oi.id = ai.owner_id) where 1 = 1
AND oi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{auditInfo.name},'%')
AND ci.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{auditInfo.title},'%')
order by ai.create_date desc
